pageTitle: Iware Supplychain Services IPO Date, Price, GMP, Details
pageHeading: Iware Supplychain Services Limited IPO (Iware Supplychain Services IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 1200 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: The promoters of the company are Krishnakumar Jagdishprasad Tanwar Rajnish Gautam and Inter India Roadways Private Limited.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 2018, iWare Supply Chain Services Limited is pan-India integrated logistics company providing a wide range of services including warehousing (with third-party logistics (3PL) and carrying & forwarding agent operations), transportation, rake handling services, business auxiliary services, and rental income operating across multiple states in India like Gujarat, West Bengal, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Punjab, Haryana, and Delhi essentially offering comprehensive supply chain management solutions through their extensive network across the country.

The company offers services in multiple states, including Gujarat, West Bengal, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Punjab, Haryana, and Delhi, ensuring comprehensive coverage and reliable service delivery.

The company offers logistics support and solutions through its extensive network and integrated services across India.

As of anuary 2025, iWare's fleet has grown from 15 vehicles in the financial year 2022 to 47 vehicles, comprising 15 units of 22-feet open-body trucks and the remaining 32-feet containers.

iWare's extensive network supports FMCG, pharmaceuticals, retail, and e-commerce industries.

The company operates over 100 BCN rakes annually, transporting approximately 220,000 metric tons of goods annually.

iWare's extensive road fleet includes 500 company-owned trucks and access to an additional 10,000 vehicles through partnerships. The company offers flexible transport solutions, such as Full Truck Load (FTL), Half Truck Load (HTL), and containerized options, catering to diverse business needs.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Pan-India Presence – The company has an extensive network across multiple states, ensuring broad geographical coverage and seamless logistics services.
  • Diverse Service Offerings – iWare provides end-to-end logistics solutions, including warehousing, transportation, rack handling, business auxiliary services, and rental income, making it a one-stop solution for supply chain management.
  • Integrated Multimodal Transportation – With both road and rail logistics solutions, including its association with Indian Railways' BCN rake services, iWare ensures cost-efficient and reliable goods transportation.
  • Strong Fleet & Infrastructure – iWare operates a growing fleet of company-owned and partnered vehicles, along with strategically located warehouses, ensuring efficient cargo handling.
  • Technology-Driven Operations – The company leverages digital tools for real-time tracking, route optimization, and inventory management, enhancing operational efficiency.
  • Industry Expertise – iWare is backed by experienced promoters with over 20 years of expertise in the logistics sector, ensuring deep industry knowledge and strong business strategies.
  • Strategic Partnerships – The company collaborates with leading corporations like Adani Wilmar and operates large-scale warehouses to cater to high-demand businesses.
  • Focus on Sustainability – With eco-friendly initiatives like CNG-powered trucks and energy-efficient warehouses, iWare is committed to reducing its carbon footprint and supporting green logistics.
  • Expanding Market Reach – iWare is extending its services to Tier II and Tier III cities, enabling small and medium-sized businesses to access high-quality logistics solutions.
  • Government Policy Alignment – The company’s operations align with India's National Logistics Policy and PM Gati Shakti program, positioning it as a key player in the country's logistics growth.

contactDetails.full_address: Iware Supplychain Services Limited, 7 th Floor 707 Iscon Elegance Nr. Jain Temple, Prahladnagar Cross Road, S.G. Highway

faqs.question: What is the Iware Supplychain Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Iware Supplychain Services IPO is a SME IPO of 2856000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹27.13 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹95 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on April 28, 2025, and closes on April 30, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Iware Supplychain Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Iware Supplychain Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Iware Supplychain Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Iware Supplychain Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Iware Supplychain Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Iware Supplychain Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Iware Supplychain Services IPO opens on April 28, 2025 and closes on April 30, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Iware Supplychain Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Iware Supplychain Services IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Iware Supplychain Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Iware Supplychain Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Iware Supplychain Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Iware Supplychain Services IPO will be done on Friday, May 2, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, May 5, 2025. Check the Iware Supplychain Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Iware Supplychain Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Iware Supplychain Services IPO listing date is on Tuesday, May 6, 2025.

reservation.summary: Iware Supplychain Services IPO offers total 2856000 shares. Out of which 1356000 (47.48%) allocated to NII 1356000 (47.48%) allocated to RII.
